courses.subject: RMED
courses.title: Research Project

meetings.instructor:
Professor LAI Hei Ming, 
Professor NG Ho Keung

courses.description: In this course, a student is required to meet with his/her supervisor regularly who provides necessary guidance and supervision to write up a thesis and monitors the student's academic progress.
courses.enrollment_requirement: For students in MSc Research Medicine
courses.learning_outcomes: The student will conduct a substantial and in-depth research project in biomedical or clinical sciences under supervision from a professor/professors. The project should include extensive literature review and practical/laboratory/clinical work. A dissertation of not less than 8,000 words will have to be submitted. A short presentation will also be required.
courses.course_syllabus: To be determined by individual professors subject to the topic of research to be conducted by the student.
courses.feedback_evaluation:
Course and Teaching Evaluation (CTE) will be conducted as per all Faculty courses. In addition, the program director carries out a focus group
discussion at the end of the year
courses.required_readings: To be provided by individual professors based on the topic of research to be conducted by the student.
courses.recommended_readings: To be provided by individual professors based on the topic of research to be conducted by the student.
